com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui

Class VTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui.VTypes

  • public class VTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic pre-created validation types. Overridable validation definitions. The validations provided are basic and intended to be easily customizable and extended.
    See Also:
    TextField.setVtype(VTypes)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VTypes ALPHA
      The function used to validate alpha values
      static VTypes ALPHANUM
      The function used to validate alphanumeric values.
      static VTypes EMAIL
      The function used to validate email addresses.
      static VTypes URL
      The function used to validate URLs.
